      • fadeIn

        public static void fadeIn(android.view.View $receiver,
                          long duration,
                          boolean showIfInvisible,
                          android.animation.Animator.AnimatorListener listener)

        Fades in the View.

        Parameters:
        duration - The duration of the animation
        showIfInvisible - If this view is invisible and this parameter is set to true the view will be first set to visible with an alpha of 0.0.
        listener - An optional animator listener in case you want to perform operations during any part of the lifecycle of the animation

      • fadeOut

        public static void fadeOut(android.view.View $receiver,
                           long duration,
                           boolean showIfInvisible,
                           android.animation.Animator.AnimatorListener listener)

        Fades out the View.

        Parameters:
        duration - The duration of the animation
        showIfInvisible - If this view is invisible and this parameter is set to true the view will be first set to visible with an alpha of 1.0.
        listener - An optional animator listener in case you want to perform operations during any part of the lifecycle of the animation
